name: component-detection-github-submission-task
description: Upload information about your dependencies to the GitHub dependency graph using component detection
author: GitHub Advanced Security

inputs.name: githubRepository
inputs.label: GitHub Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GitHub repository to submit dependencies to (format: owner/repo)

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: GitHub Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: GitHub Personal Access Token with 'Contents' repository permissions (write)

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the directory containing the environment files to upload

inputs.name: directoryExclusionList
inputs.label: Directory Exclusion List
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filters out specific directories following a minimatch pattern

inputs.name: detectorArgs
inputs.label: Detector Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of properties that can affect the detectors execution

inputs.name: dockerImagesToScan
inputs.label: Docker Images to Scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of docker image names or hashes to execute container scanning on

inputs.name: detectorsFilter
inputs.label: Detectors Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list with the identifiers of the specific detectors to be used

inputs.name: detectorsCategories
inputs.label: Detector Categories
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list with the categories of components that are going to be scanned

inputs.name: correlator
inputs.label: Correlator
inputs.helpMarkDown: An optional identifier to distinguish between multiple dependency snapshots of the same type

inputs.name: detector-name
inputs.label: Detector Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the detector. If provided, detector-version and detector-url must also be provided

inputs.name: detector-version
inputs.label: Detector Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the detector. If provided, detector-name and detector-url must also be provided

inputs.name: detector-url
inputs.label: Detector URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the detector. If provided, detector-name and detector-version must also be provided

inputs.name: snapshot-sha
inputs.label: Snapshot SHA
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SHA of the commit to associate with the snapshot

inputs.name: snapshot-ref
inputs.label: Snapshot Ref
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Git reference to associate with the snapshot
